alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:11PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Prowers, northeastern Baca, Kiowa and eastern Bent Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 410 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Eads to Lamar to near Springfield. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Vilas around 420 PM MDT. Walsh, Granada and Bristol around 430 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hartman and Holly. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County
